I'm Muhammad. I work as a data analyst/scientist at [Exact](https://www.exact.com) in the Netherlands. Before that I worked as a researcher at the University of Twente.

My website is built using the [{distill}](https://rstudio.github.io/distill/) package. Before that I used Hugo and the blogdown package for my website.
